release.action: Reduced size of requested images (thumbnails) in search results from 600 to 120 (width) in order to make the page lighter.
Updated to latest version of ep-core.
Updated to latest version of parent pom file (move to GitHub), biobabel-core and junit.
Updated to latest version of biomart-adapter, which fixes issue with reaction links.
Avoided repetition of pathways by checking the existence of an element in the DOM.
Updated to latest version of literature-adapter, which speeds up the literature tab.
Updated to latest version of ep-core, which fixes issue with missing structure thumbnails (when there are theoretical models involved).

Updated to latest versions of ep-core - which allows retrieval of cofactors and fixes tomcat suicides -, intenz-adapter - which can take data from the new IntEnz web service -, literature-adapter - which is faster now - and das-adapter - with partially implemented JMX configuration.
Added section for cofactors in small molecules tab.
Cache size increased to 100 (open sessions are usually around 70).
Fixed configuration for searches: maxUniprotResults down to 500, maxResults down to 500 (users won't be bothered if they get 500 results instead of 1000).
Fixed JSP for citation types other than journal article.
Added number of citations per tab/type.
Added filters for citation types (only visible when there are more than journal articles).
Updated to latest versions of ep-core - which fixes bug related to redundant pathways - and reactome-adapter.
Fixed issue with missing pathway descriptions.

Updated to latest versions of ep-core - which fixes bug related to extra reactions shown and removes System.out.println's -, ep-util, mega-mapper - which fixes 'too many open cursors' issue - and junit (in case we write some tests at some point).
Fixed the health check filter configuration.
Fixed href to Reactome reactions.
Forced version of rhea-adapter to override the transitive dependency, which fixes coefficients of reaction participants. Fixed also in the JSP.
Forced version of literature-adapter, which fixes issues with the CiteXplore web service resulting in missing literature filters or even no citations at all.
Forced versions of ep-util, which fixes serious issue with searches resulting in no results at all.
Updated to latest versions of ep-core and log4j
